name: Space Governor
description:
Collect as many prisoners from Earth and deliver them to prisons on Mercury, Venus, Mars and the Moon.

The further the prison is from Earth will reward more Credits, but your Food and Water supplies will also deplete quicker the more prisoners you carry, causing a Game Over.

A quick way to make money is to mine asteroids, but if your not careful, you could bring destruction on your ship.

Ship Controls:  Left/Right Arrow Keys to Rotate Ship, Space Key to Accelerate ship.

Planetary Menu Controls:  Up/Down Arrow Keys to Select Option, Space Key to Use Option.

Created for Weekly Game Jam 118 - Theme:  Spaceship
